## Album.metadata() method

Returns the full metadata for the album including all photos inside.

**Signature:**

```typescript
metadata(): Promise<albumSchemaType>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[albumSchemaType](./photo-dir-to-json.albumschematype.md)<!-- -->&gt;

A promise that resolves to full album metadata after photo metadata is read from disk
